title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: My great-grandfather, John Rutherford, minister of the gospel at Yarrow, married one of this reverend gentleman's daughters ; and John Pringle, rector of Fogo, great-grandfather of the present Whytbank, married another.

title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: My great-grandfather, John Rutherford, minister of the gospel at Yarrow, married one of this reverend gentleman's daughters; and John Pringle, rector of Fogo, great-grandfather of the present Whytbank, married another.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: We went down together to Berwickshire in the middle of May, where we remained some days at Fogo Manse, the Rev. Mr William Home's, where, leaving John with his bride, we carne on to Musselburgh about the 27th of May, near the end of the General Assembly.

title: Autobiography of the Rev. Dr Alexander Carlyle ;
author: Carlyle, Alexander
snippet: In April I made a tour with Mary to Berwick, Langton, and Fogo, for her health, and to visit our friends.

title: Spare hours...
author: Brown, John
snippet: May you and the cooper be like him of Fogo, each a better man than his father ; and you, Mungo the mole-catcher, and Tod Laurie, and Sir Robert the cadger, and all the other odd people, I shake your fists twice, for I like your line.
